mod.name: Rogue Adventure
mod.description:
A mod that adds in content from "Rogue Adventure", a free mobile Roguelike. Would highly recommend checking it out on the appstore! 

This is not made by the same creators, it's a fan project. 

For now the mod is just relics, but expect more content to come soon!

relics.name: Anti-Monster Mine
relics.description: Deals 9 damage back and applies 1 Weak to the first enemy that attacks you each combat.
relics.flavorText: A small explosive mine meant to deter monsters without harming the holder.

relics.name: Darkness Boots
relics.description: At the start of the turn, gain 2 Block for every enemy with Weak or Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: A powerful relic that draws on the suffering of others. Luckily the magic is confined to a stylish pair of boots.

relics.name: Living Mana
relics.description: At the end of your turn, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies if you have any unused mana.

relics.name: Bounty Hunter
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, gain 8 Gold.
relics.flavorText: With so many monsters living in the Spire, it's easy to find someone who wants them dead.

relics.name: Dark Wall
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: A dark mist follows you around, obscuring the view of your enemies.

relics.name: Electrostatic Field
relics.description: Everytime you fully Block an attack, gain 1 charge. At the end of your turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the charges. Resets each combat.
relics.flavorText: A charge that absorb all static generated around it.

relics.name: Explosive Enemies
relics.description: Whenever an enemy dies, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: You don't know how this works, and you don't really have an interest in learning.

relics.name: Solid Shell
relics.description: Gain 8 Block every 10 cards you play.
relics.flavorText: Even just a bit of plating offers more defense than none.

relics.name: Golden Shield
relics.description: Gain 3 Strength next turn if you fully Block ALL attacks from enemies this turn.
relics.flavorText: A spotless golden shield that has seen many battles. One of the last to avoid corruption.

relics.name: Snail Shell
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 2 Blur.
relics.flavorText: A near indestructible shell that has lasted from before the Spireblight.

relics.name: Soul Drain
relics.description: Heal 3 HP when you kill a non-minion enemy.
relics.flavorText: With every slain enemy you only feel more invigorated.

relics.name: Growth Blessing
relics.description: At the end of combat, raise your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: After every challenge you feel more capable.

relics.name: Rock Dagger
relics.description: Every other turn, after playing your first Attack card, gain 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: A dagger infused with the might of the earth.

relics.name: Thunder Dagger
relics.description: Every other turn, your first Attack card deals 8 damage to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A dagger infused with the might of lightning.

relics.name: Weak Dagger
relics.description: Every other turn, your first Attack card applies 1 Weak to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: A dagger infused with the might of darkness.

relics.name: Book of Evil
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, reduce your Max HP by 40%.
relics.flavorText: The book drains your very life away, but offers tremendous power in return.

relics.name: Mystery Box
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain 1 Common Relic and 1 Uncommon Relic.
relics.flavorText: A large soundproof box, so there's no shaking to see what you may get.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
